item.title: Beyond Air Inc 10-K
item.description: Beyond Air Inc, which is in the Surgical & Medical Instruments & Apparatus [3841] industry, SEC 10-K filing on June 10, 2021 had 43972 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: may - 636 instances product - 395 instances clinical - 324 instances company - 268 instances fda - 255 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
